title: Exhibition catalog Moč in nemoč
img_alt: Catalog for the Moč in nemoč exhibition by Seiji Kimoto in Tržič
unterschrift: Exhibition catalog "Moč in nemoč, Seiji Kimoto"
intro_text: Gallery Paviljon NOB in 2016 published an exhibition catalog for the exhibition Moč in nemoč in Tržič with texts by Janita Košir and Ursula Kimoto. The publication was supported by the municipality of Tržič, the Slovenian Minister of Culture and the Saarland Ministry of Education and Culture.
